meanings.definition: To perform better or achieve more than expected or required.
meanings.sent1: She overachieves in all her school subjects.
meanings.sent2: He consistently overachieves in his sales targets.
meanings.sent3: The little ant overachieves by carrying a huge crumb on its back.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to overachieve is like a bright beacon in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The athlete overachieves, breaking records with every race.

meanings.definition: To excel or succeed beyond what is considered normal or usual.
meanings.sent1: The team overachieves by winning the championship against all odds.
meanings.sent2: She overachieves in her artistic endeavors, creating masterpieces effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel overachieves by gathering an entire winter's worth of nuts in one day.
meanings.sent4: His passion for music overachieves, touching the hearts of all who listen.
meanings.sent5: The plant overachieves, blooming with vibrant colors even in harsh conditions.
